channel.title: RED INFRA RED LIGHT PAD INTRODUCTION
channel.itunes:author: Michael
channel.description: RED/INFRA RED LIGHT HAS BEEN PERFECTED. THROUGH THE USAGE OF LIGHT SOUND AND GEOMETRY OUR PADS CAN LESSEN PAIN, CLEAR TOXINS AND SUPPORT THE BODY WITH “LIGHT NOURISHMENT”. SPECIFIC FREQUENCIES WILL STIMULATE THE NATURAL HEALING PROCESS OF THE BODY THROUGH PHOTO-KINESIS. IMAGINE YOU YOUR PETS AND FRIENDS RECEIVING PERFECT LIGHT FREQUENCIES TO BRING GREATER WELLBEING INTO YOUR NOW! WE BRING THIS TO YOU THE HEALING LIGHT PAD VISUALISATION INCREASE THE MENTAL CLARITY AND FOCUS REQUIRED FOR NATURAL HEALING. THIS VISUALISATION IS A FREE GIFT WITH THE RED INFRARED LIGHT PADS. WE CANENTRAIN THE FLOW OF ENERGY THROUGH OUR BODY TO DO WHAT EVER WE CHOOSE. TRY IT*
